name: Property Of The Sky (DEMO)
description:
Game Description ( You are a normal college student named Camero Brine. However your normal life quickly turns chaotic when a strange girl falls from the sky.  Now taking care of another adult isn't to difficult however theres one slight problem.  She speaks a language that does not exist on earth.  So are you up to the challenge only one way to find out.)

(Author Notes) Hi everyone, this is just a short demo of a game i'm working on called Property Of The Sky. As you can see its still heavily in development. However I would love to hear some feedback from others just so I can see how i'm really doing. All feedback is much appreciated so please don't hesitate. So thank you all :)
